property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit 1 foundation: Your attack gets +X damage. X equals the number of other cards in your card pool.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Commit 2 foundations: Before you make a control check, the control check is equal to your momentum (no check necessary).

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Remove this card from the game: After you take damage from your opponent's attack, reduce that damage to 1. Only playable if both your character's height and weight are greater than the height and weight of your opponent's character.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit 1 foundation: Make a control check. Your attack gets +X damage. X equals the control check.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If this attack deals 5 or more damage, during your End Phase you may move this attack into your staging area as a foundation instead of adding it to your momentum.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: Make a number of control checks equal to your momentum plus 1. This attack gets +X damage. X equals the number of control checks that were higher than the previous control check.

property.name: CardText
property.value: You may only play this card if you have at least 2 other cards in your card pool.R Discard 1 momentum: Before you make a control check, that check gets +2. If successful, discard this card from your card pool.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Discard 1 momentum: If this attack is blocked, your opponent loses 1 vitality.Astaroth E Discard 1 momentum: If this attack is blocked, your opponent loses 3 vitality.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: Make a control check. The damage of this card equals the control check.

property.name: CardText
property.value: You may only play this card if you have at least 1 other card in your card pool.E: If you use this attack's Powerful ability, you may discard cards from your hand as well as your momentum to pay its cost.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If this attack deals damage, the rest of your attacks this turn get +1 damage for each attack in your card pool that dealt damage this turn.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If this card is added to your momentum, add it face up.R Discard 1 momentum: Before you make a control check, that check gets +X. X equals your momentum. Only playable while this card is face up in your momentum.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If this card is added to your momentum, add it face up.R Discard this card from your momentum: After you take damage, reduce that damage by 3 (to a minimum of 1). Only playable while this card is face up in your momentum.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If this card is added to your momentum, add it face up.R Discard this card from your momentum: After you take damage, reduce that damage by X (to a minimum of 1). X equals the number of your ready foundations. Only playable while this card is face up in your momentum.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: You and your opponent both make a control check. If your control check was higher than your opponent's, this attack gets +X damage. X equals your opponent's control check.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Discard 1 momentum: Your attack gets +X damage. X equals the discarded card's control.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Commit: Before an opponent's attack deals damage, that damage is reduced to its printed value.Astaroth E Commit: Any attack gets -3 damage.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: Your attack gets +X damage. X equals the number of other attacks in your card pool.Astaroth E Discard 2 momentum: Your attack gets +X damage. X equals the number of other cards in your card pool.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R: Before making a control check for an attack played as a Reversal, any blocks in your card pool do not count toward the attack's difficulty.E Discard 1 momentum: Your attack gets +1 speed.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Discard 1 card: After your opponent plays a non-attack card, negate it's effects and discard it from their card pool if the card you discarded was of the same type as their played card.F Commit: Play 1 attack from your hand as normal. That attack gets +2 speed.

property.name: CardText
property.value: F Commit 1 foundation and discard 1 momentum: All your attacks this turn get +1 speed.

property.name: CardText
property.value: Your Reversals get +1 damage.F Destroy this card: Destroy 1 enemy weapon asset.

property.name: CardText
property.value: You may only play this card as a block if you have 2 or less cards in your card pool.E Discard 1 momentum: This attack gets +2 speed.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Draw 1 card: This attack gets +4 speed. Only playable if this card shares a resource symbol with your opponent's character card.

property.name: CardText
property.value: If this attack is completely blocked, it still deals half damage (rounded up).E: Switch this attack's damage and speed values.

property.name: CardText
property.value: If this attack is completely blocked, it still deals half damage (rounded up).E Commit X foundations: Commit X of your opponent's foundations.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: This attack gets +X speed. X equals the number of foundations you committed to pass this attack's control check.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R: After you block with this card, add it to your momentum.Cassandra E Discard 1 momentum: Your opponent discards 2 momentum. Only playable if this attack's speed is greater than the amount of cards in your opponent's momentum.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: This attack gets +X speed. X equals your momentum.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If this card is added to your momentum, add it face up.R Commit: When you give an attack a speed bonus, ready 1 foundation. Only playable while this card is face up in your momentum.

property.name: CardText
property.value: Can only be played as a reversal if your opponent has a non-attack card in their card pool.E Discard 1 momentum: Your next attack this turn gets +2 speed.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Discard 1 card: Your next attack this turn gets +3 speed.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Discard 1 momentum: This attack may only be blocked by [Air] cards.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Commit 1 foundation: After you block an attack, draw 1 card.Cassandra R: After you draw a card, your attack gets +1 speed.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Commit: After you fail to block an attack, you may play another block.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Commit: After you fail to play an attack as a Reversal, you may play another Reversal.Cassandra E Commit: Your attack gets +1 speed.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Commit 1 foundation: After 1 of your attacks deals damage, your opponent loses 1 vitality.F Commit: Add 1 [Fire] card in your card pool to your momentum.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit 2 foundations: Your opponent must discard 1 momentum as an additional cost to block your attack.

property.name: CardText
property.value: F: Draw 1 card. If the next card you play this turn is an attack, it gets +3 speed.Mitsurugi F: If the next card you play this turn is an attack it gets +3 speed and +2 damage.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: Your weapon attack gets +1 damage.R Discard 1 momentum: Before you make a control check for a block, that block gets -1 difficulty.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit 1 foundation: This attack gets +2 damage. Only playable if you have more momentum than your opponent.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Commit 1 foundation: After you completely block an attack with this card, play it as a Reversal. Only playable if you have more momentum than your opponent.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Discard 1 card: This attack gets +3 speed and -1 damage.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Discard X momentum: This attack gets +X speed. You may not discard more momentum than you have cards in your card pool.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If this attack is blocked, the next [Fire] attack you play this turn gets +2 damage.

property.name: CardText
property.value: Mitsurugi E Discard 2 momentum: This attack gets +2 damage.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Discard 1 momentum: This attack gets +1 speed.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Destroy 1 foundation you control: Your opponent loses 1 vitality.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Lose 3 vitality: Your opponent loses 2 vitality.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: Your opponent loses 1 vitality. Only playable if you have more momentum than your opponent.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: This attack gets +X speed. X equals the number of cards in your opponent's card pool.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: Your [Fire] attack gets +2 damage or +2 speed.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: Your [Fire] attack gets +2 damage.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Commit: After an attack you played as a Reversal is blocked, your opponent loses 3 vitality.Mitsurugi R Commit: commit 1 other foundation: After your attack is blocked, your opponent loses 3 vitality.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Commit, commit 2 foundations: After your opponent plays a card to their card pool, negate the effects of that card and discard it from their card pool.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Commit 1 foundation: After your opponent plays a non-attack card, they discard 1 card.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Discard 2 momentum: After your opponent plays an attack or action card, negate the effects of that card and discard it from their card pool.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Commit, commit 1 foundation: After a response or enhance ability or card is played, negate its effects and discard it from their card pool.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit 1 foundation: If this attack is completely blocked, your opponent loses 3 vitality.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit 1 foundation: Change the attack zone of this attack to mid or low.

property.name: CardText
property.value: You may only play this card if you have at least 2 other attacks in your card pool.E If this card is added to your momentum, add it face up.R Discard 1 momentum: After your opponent plays an effect printed on a character card, negate the effects of that ability and commit their character. Only playable while this card is face up in your momentum.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit 1 foundation: Change the attack zone of this attack to mid.Nightmare E: Change the attack zone of this attack to mid or low.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Discard this card from your card pool: After your opponent plays a block, negate the effects of that block. Your opponent may attempt to block again.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit 1 foundation: This attack may only be blocked by mid blocks.Nightmare E: If this attack deals damage your opponent discards 1 card.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Discard a card: Switch this attack's speed and damage values.Nightmare E Commit 1 foundation: This attack is unblockable and gets -2 damage.

property.name: CardText
property.value: You may only play this card if you have at least 1 other attack in your card pool.E If this card is added to your momentum, add it face up.R Discard X momentum: After your opponent plays an attack, discard it from their card pool if X is greater than its speed. Only playable while this card is face up in your momentum.

property.name: CardText
property.value: You may only play this card if you have at least 1 other attack in your card pool.E: If this card is added to your momentum, add it face up.R Discard this card from your momentum: After your opponent plays an ability printed on a foundation, negate the effects of that ability. Only playable while this card is face up in your momentum.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E If this card is added to your momentum, add it face up.E Discard this card from your momentum: Your attack gets a speed bonus equal to your remaining momentum. Only playable while this card is face up in your momentum.

property.name: CardText
property.value: If this attack is completely blocked, it still deals half damage (rounded up).R Commit 1 foundation: After your opponent completely blocks this attack, if the damage this attack would have dealt was at least twice its speed, then your opponent loses vitality equal to half the damage of this attack (rounded up).

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit, discard 1 momentum: Your attack gets +X damage. X equals your attack's printed speed.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Destroy this foundation: After your opponent plays an ability printed on a foundation, negate the ability and destroy the foundation.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: If your attack is blocked, your opponent loses 2 vitality.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Commit 1 foundation: After your opponent blocks, they discard 1 card.E Commit: Discard any number of cards. Choose 1 card in your hand with a difficulty less than or equal to the total difficulty of the discarded cards and play that card as normal (no control check needed).

property.name: CardText
property.value: R: After you play a card into your card pool, you gain 1 vitality. Only playable if there is at least 1 card in your card pool and only if it is your turn.R Commit: Before you make a control check for an [Air] attack, the [Air] attacks already in your card pool do not count towards the attack's difficulty.

property.name: CardText
property.value: F: You gain X vitality. X equals your momentum.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: Your [Air] attack gets +1 speed.F Commit: Ready up to 2 foundations you control.

property.name: CardText
property.value: While in your card pool, this card does not add to the difficulty of attacks you play. If you are playing Taki, this card does not add to the difficulty of any cards you play.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If this attack deals damage, you gain 1 vitality.Taki E: If this attack deals damage, you gain 1 vitality.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Discard 1 momentum: Before you make this attack's control check, other [Air] attacks in your card pool don't count towards its difficulty.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: Discard All other attacks in your card pool that did not deal damage.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Discard 1 momentum: If this attack deals damage, make a control check. You gain an amount of vitality equal to the control check.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: Name a card. If this attack deals damage, your opponent reveals their hand and discards All copies of the named card in their hand.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Discard 1 card: Your opponent discards 1 card.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: Look at your opponent's hand and choose 1 card. Your opponent discards the chosen card.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: Choose an [Air] card in your card pool and discard it. If that card is a foundation or asset card you may place it in your staging area instead.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If this attack deals damage, your opponent discards 2 cards.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If this attack deals damage, make a control check. If the control check is higher than the damage this attack dealt, discard this card from your card pool.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Remove this foundation from the game: After you fail a control check, that check gets +3. If the new total would be high enough to pass the check, you pass the check.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Commit: After you ready this foundation, you gain 1 vitality.Taki R Discard 1 momentum: After you ready this foundation, you gain 1 vitality.

property.name: CardText
property.value: F Commit, discard 1 momentum: Discard 2 cards from your card pool.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R: After you block an attack, draw 1 card.R Discard 1 momentum: After you partiAlly block an attack, you take no damage from that attack.

property.name: CardText
property.value: F Commit, discard 1 card without a block on it: Draw 1 card.E Commit 1 foundation: Draw 1 card. Only playable during your opponent's turn.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Discard 1 momentum: After an attack deals damage, add 1 card from your discard pile to your momentum.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R: After you add an attack card to your momentum, add the top card of your discard pile to your momentum.F Discard 1 momentum: Your opponent discards 2 momentum.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R: After you have played this card as a block, take 3 cards from your discard pile and put them on the bottom of your deck in any Order.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If this attack (or any copies of this attack generated by its Multiple ability) deals damage, add 1 card from your discard pile to your momentum.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If this attack deals damage, your opponent's control checks get -1 as long as this card is in your card pool.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: Each player reveals 1 random card from their hand. The player with the highest control draws 1 card.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If this attack deals damage, each player draws a number of cards equal to their momentum.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit 1 foundation: Draw 1 card.Voldo E Commit 1 foundation: Draw 2 cards.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: Your opponent discards 1 momentum and you add 1 card from your discard pile to your momentum.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If this attack deals damage, both players commit X foundations. X equals the speed of this attack.Voldo E Discard X cards: Add X cards from your discard pile to your momentum.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R: After this attack is blocked, you draw 2 cards and your opponent draws 1 card.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Discard 1 card: Draw 1 card.Voldo E: Add 1 card from your hand or discard pile to your momentum.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: Pick a number. Your opponent makes a control check. If the chosen number matches the control check, your opponent discards the top card of their deck.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: Take 1 card in your discard and place it on the bottom of your deck. Only playable if you have an [All] card in your card pool.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Discard 1 momentum: After you play a block, you completely block the attack.

property.name: CardText
property.value: F Commit, discard 1 momentum: Take 1 card in your discard pile and add it to your hand.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R: After you take 5 or less damage, reduce that damage to 0.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Discard 1 momentum: After you choose not to block an attack, instead of being dealt damage normAlly, you take half of the damage (rounded down) and your opponent takes half of the damage (rounded up).

property.name: CardText
property.value: F: Both players are returned to their character's printed vitality.

property.name: CardText
property.value: F: Discard 1 card. If the discarded card's control is equal to or greater than the number of foundations you have in your staging area, your opponent either reveals their hand or discards 1 card (your choice).R: After you block with this card, discard it from your card pool.

property.name: CardText
property.value: F: Both players discard All cards in their momentum and lose 1 vitality for each card discarded this way.

property.name: CardText
property.value: F: Discard 1 card.While this card is in your card pool your [Earth] attacks get +1 damage and after your opponent successfully blocks an attack, they must discard the top card of their deck.

property.name: CardText
property.value: F: For the rest of the turn, you may discard a card from your hand when making a control check instead of discarding the top card of your deck.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R: After your opponent plays a non-attack card, for their next form they must either play an attack or pass.

property.name: CardText
property.value: F Commit 6 foundations: Destroy this card. Your opponent may play this ability.R: After one of your attacks deals 6 or more damage with 1 attack, if you have at least 1 other copy of this card in your staging area, you score a 'Ring Out' and win the game. Only playable during your turn.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Commit, discard 1 momentum: After your opponent plays an attack, choose a number from 2 to 5. Your opponent then makes a control check. If the check is equal to the number you chose, the attack's damage is doubled. If the check is not equal to the number you chose, the attack is blocked completely.

property.name: CardText
property.value: While this card is ready in your staging area, any damage you take is reduced to 0. Do not ready this card as normal at the beginning of your turn.F Discard your hand or commit All ready cards in your staging area: Ready or commit this card. Any player may play this ability.

property.name: CardText
property.value: While this card is ready in your staging area, after you take damage from any source, reduce that damage by 1 (to a minimum of 1).

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If this attack is blocked, your next attack gets -1 difficulty.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If this attack deals damage, your opponent commits their character card and discards 1 card. Only playable if you have more cards in your card pool than your opponent has in their card pool.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit 1 foundation: Your opponent's blocks get +1 difficulty for the rest of the turn.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit 1 foundation: Add 1 random face down card from your momentum to your hand. Only playable if you have already played the Powerful ability of this card.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If this attack is blocked, your opponent must either commit 1 foundation or lose 1 vitality.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If this attack is blocked, your opponent must either commit 1 foundation or discard 1 card.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit 1 foundation: This attack gets 'Powerful: 1'.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If this attack deals damage, commit any 1 asset or character card.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If your opponent blocks this attack with a high zone block, they discard 1 card.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit 1 foundation: This attack gets +1 damage.

property.name: CardText
property.value: If your opponent blocks this attack with a non-matching zone, it counts as completely blocked. If they block with a matching zone, it counts as partiAlly blocked.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Discard 1 momentum: This attack gets 'Stun: 1'.

property.name: CardText
property.value: While this card is ready in your staging area you may only play attacks to your card pool.E Commit: Your attack gets +3 damage.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Commit: Before you make a control check for a block, that block gets -2 difficulty. Only playable if you have a weapon card in your card pool.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit, discard 1 momentum, commit 1 foundation: Powerful abilities can't be played and your opponent may not play attacks as Reversals for the rest of this turn.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit, discard 3 momentum: Your weapon attack gets +X damage. X equals your character's hand size.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Commit: After you block an attack, discard 1 card from any card pool. Only playable if you have more total speed in your card pool than your opponent has in their card pool.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit, discard 1 momentum, commit 1 foundation: Multiple and Stun abilities can't be played until the end of the turn.

property.name: CardText
property.value: F Commit: Choose 1 random face down card in your momentum and reveal it. If the revealed card is an attack or action card you could normAlly play, play it (no control check necessary).

property.name: CardText
property.value: While this card is ready in your staging area you may not play attacks to your card pool.F Commit, discard 1 momentum: Either draw 1 card or your opponent discards 1 card.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit, discard X momentum: Your attack is unblockable. X equals the difficulty of the attack.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: Your weapon attack gets +2 damage.
